name: Ekko
title: the Boy Who Shattered Time
lore: A prodigy from the rough streets of Zaun, Ekko manipulates time to spin any situation to his advantage. Using his own invention, the Zero-Drive, he explores the branching possibilities of reality. As well as experimenting with multi-dimensional probability, Ekko spends his days running wild with the other lost children of Zaun. Though he revels in this freedom, when there's a threat to his friends, he'll endure anything to defend them. To the unknowing observer, Ekko accomplishes the impossible with ease, time and time again.
blurb: A prodigy from the rough streets of Zaun, Ekko manipulates time to spin any situation to his advantage. Using his own invention, the Zero-Drive, he explores the branching possibilities of reality. As well as experimenting with multi-dimensional ...
allytips_0: Chronobreak is a potent escape tool, but it can also be quite powerful when used offensively. Don't underestimate its damage potential.
allytips_1: If you can proc Z-Drive Resonance on an enemy champion, it's worth taking risks to do so. The bonus movement speed makes it easy to escape.
allytips_2: Phase Dive's dash is a great tool for setting up Ekko's other abilities. Use it to get double hits with Timewinder or get into position to detonate Parallel Convergence.
enemytips_0: Ekko is significantly weaker when his ultimate is down. Watch for the trail he leaves behind to determine if Chronobreak is available.
enemytips_1: Ekko's stun zone takes 3 seconds to arm. Watch for the image he creates on cast and try to guess where the zone was placed.
enemytips_2: The second hit of Timewinder does more damage than the first; try to avoid it.

passive_description: Ekko's Zero-Drive charges his spells and attacks with temporal energy. The third hit deals bonus damage and saps the target's movement speed. If the target is a champion, Ekko gains accelerated movement speed.
passive_sanitizedDescription: Ekko's Zero-Drive charges his spells and attacks with temporal energy. The third hit deals bonus damage and saps the target's movement speed. If the target is a champion, Ekko gains accelerated movement speed.
